Table.sql: SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM his.btdbn a,hismmyy.benhanpk c,his.bctheoicd d WHERE a.mabn=c.mabn and c.maicd=d.ma

SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM his.btdbn a,his.benhanngtr c,his.bctheoicd d WHERE a.mabn=c.mabn and c.maicdrv=d.ma

SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM his.btdbn a,hismmyy.benhancc c,his.bctheoicd d WHERE a.mabn=c.mabn and c.maicdrv=d.ma

SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM his.btdbn a,his.benhandt c,his.bctheoicd d WHERE a.mabn=c.mabn and c.loaiba=1 and c.maicd=d.ma

SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM his.btdbn a,his.benhandt b,his.nhapkhoa c,his.bctheoicd d WHERE a.mabn=b.mabn and b.maql=c.maql and b.loaiba=1 and c.maicd=d.ma

SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM his.btdbn a,his.nhapkhoa b,his.xuatkhoa c,his.bctheoicd d,his.benhandt e WHERE a.mabn=b.mabn and b.id=c.id and b.maql=e.maql and e.loaiba=1 and c.maicd=d.ma

SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM his.btdbn a,his.benhandt b,his.xuatvien c,his.bctheoicd d WHERE a.mabn=b.mabn and b.maql=c.maql and b.loaiba=1 and c.maicd=d.ma
